name: Star Clutter
description:
The Big Bang didn’t go as smoothly as scientists thought. The stars are all in pieces and it’s up to you to assemble them back together! However, you came too early do the tools are not fully implemented. The thermometer is being temperamental.

Control is a mouse left-click button. This game was made for Wild Godot Jam #53.

Known Issues:

  • Cannot tell which piece goes where in the middle.
  • Thermometer gauge is not 100% consistent.
  • Hard to understand how to use the thermometer.
  • No tutorial.
  • Not clear the game is endless.
  • Sound can be scary if not expecting with no way to turn off sound in game.
  • No way to decrease music level.
  • No pause menu.
  • Game doesn't ensure you have all of the pieces you need to assemble a star.
  • No easy way to separate multiple star pieces on each other.
  • No way to remap the left-click button to something else the user wants.
  • No subtitles for the UI interaction. No subtitles for the instrumental music and sound effects.
  • No way to change the color for users.
